document.full_text: a japanese power company executive apologized for spreading radiation into the air and sea as regulators said the pumping of radioactive water into waters off japan from a crippled nuclear plant would end on sunday, one day later than planned.
document.title: japan's reactor operator apologizes for radiation
lines_and_colors: a japanese power company executive apologized for spreading radiation into the air and sea as regulators said the pumping of radioactive water into waters off japan from a crippled nuclear plant would end on sunday, one day later than planned.
